data.title: The Guardian: reach by demographic UK 2020
data.meta_description: Readers of The Guardian were more likely to be women, with nearly 15 million monthly female readers in the United Kingdom from April 2019 to March 2020.
data.text:
Reach of The Guardian in the United Kingdom 2019-2020, by demographic

Published by

Monthly reach of The Guardian in the United Kingdom from April 2019 to March 2020, by demographic group (in 1,000s)

More information

Region

United Kingdom

Survey time period

April 2019 to March 2020

Age group

15 years and above

Special properties

all print and digital related content

Supplementary notes

Where a single title had multiple websites, only the highest reaching title(s) were included here. See the source for the web addresses of each title.

PAMCo 1 2021: April ’19 – Mar ’20 print data fused with November ’20 Comscore data. The daily print figure is the daily reach of the 6-day paper (i.e. everyone who has read it 'yesterday') which can be different from the modelled 6-day AIR.

For more information on the methodology of this survey click here.
